H0.text: Tides occur because of the rotation of Earth.

H1.text: Four seasons occur because of the rotation of Earth.

H2.text: Night and day is the event that occurs because of the rotation of Earth.

H3.text: Changes in the weather are events that occur because of the rotation of Earth.

A4.text: Earth rotates eastward, in prograde motion. As viewed from the northern polar star Polaris, Earth turns counterclockwise.
